text:
Reopening as :
- not working with AZERTY keyboards on MacBook
- On Linux (Debian 8 / Gnome 3 / Java7/8) no shortcut works.
- Ctrl+6  not working on Windows 7

Hi,
What shall we do with this ?

I must say I don't like releasing a partially broken feature.
We did this for Undo feature (hopefully disabled) and it is still not fixed. We now have bug reports for it.


The feature is nice but the fact that it is not working uniformly under different platform is not great.

Regards
Philippe
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
From my investigations, it will be impossible or very difficult to make it recognize keys same way on all platforms. I personally don't think it's huge problem, since the benefit will be more than harm.

However, we can just throw away this change. Unfortunately, JMeter core don't allow to add this functionality through third-party plugin :(
